name: Pork Peking  Style
description: pork chops that are coated in a flour agent and then fried until crispy brown.

name: Sweet & Sour Pork
description: sweet and sour pork stir-fry recipe made with juicy pieces of pork tenderloin, bell peppers, onion, and pineapple.

name: Moo Shu Pork
description: sliced pork tenderloin, cucumber, and scrambled eggs, stir fried in lard together with bite-sized cuttings of wood ear mushrooms (black fungus) and enoki mushrooms.

name: Hunan Pork ( spicy )
description: Fatty pork slices, hot chili pepper, fermented black beans.

name: Pork with mixed vegetables ( spicy )
description: pork cooked with mixed spices and vegetables.

name: Spicy BBQ pork ( spicy )
description: Pork cooked with a touch of gravy with hot chillies

name: Szechuan Pork
description: Tender pork loin, crispy vegetables, and a spicy sauce.

name: Twice Cooked Pork
description: porksimmered, sliced, and then stir-fried with chilli bean paste and fermented black beans & vegetables, such as leek, green garlic, fresh chili, etc.
